      • getSuspensePayments

        public IQueryBeanResult<SuspensePayment> getSuspensePayments()
        Returns:
        IQueryBeanResult as result of query to fetch all Suspense Payments in the system

      • isActionAvailable

        public boolean isActionAvailable(SuspensePayment suspensePayment)
        Utility method that tells if it is legal in the system to take further actions on provided suspense payment, such as reversing or disbursing it.
        Parameters:
        suspensePayment - to check eligibility for
        Returns:
        true if it is legal to execute actions for the provided suspense payment.

      • reverse

        public void reverse(java.util.List<SuspensePayment> suspensePayments)
        Reverse all Suspense Payments in a passed-in list
        Parameters:
        suspensePayments - a List of Suspense Payments

      • validateSuspensePaymentsAreReversible

        public void validateSuspensePaymentsAreReversible(java.util.List<SuspensePayment> suspensePayments)
        Inspect a List of SuspensePayments that have been selected to be reversed. If any of the SuspensePayments are not in a reversible state, throw a UserDisplayableException
        Parameters:
        suspensePayments - List of SuspensePayments that have been selected to be reversed

      • getDesktopTransactionDisplayValue

        public java.lang.String getDesktopTransactionDisplayValue(SuspensePayment suspensePayment)
        Parameters:
        suspensePayment - SuspensePayment to view in UI
        Returns:
        transaction number if there is only one transaction, or special String if there are multiple

      • getDesktopTransaction

        public Transaction getDesktopTransaction(SuspensePayment suspensePayment)
        Parameters:
        suspensePayment - SuspensePayment to look at in UI
        Returns:
        Associated Transaction if there is exactly one, null if there are many or none.

      • createSuspensePaymentFromPayment

        public SuspensePayment createSuspensePaymentFromPayment(DirectBillMoneyRcvd directBillMoneyRcvd,
                                               java.lang.String accountNumber,
                                               java.lang.String policyPeriodNumber,
                                               java.lang.Boolean accountOrPolicy)
        Create a new Suspense Payment with the payment information copied from the supplied Money Received, then reverse the original money and distribution.
        Parameters:
        directBillMoneyRcvd - to copy information from and to reverse
        accountNumber - to attach to the new suspense payment
        policyPeriodNumber - to attach to the new suspense payment
        accountOrPolicy - true if account, false if policy
        Returns:
        new SuspensePayment created
